</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Mihrini ethnicity

</column>

---

You’ve fiddled with knots, locks, and blacksmith’s puzzles since you were a child to give your hands something to do. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (or another skill of your choice, if you’re already trained in Thievery). If you roll a success on a Thievery check to Pick a Lock, you get a critical success instead.
